actions.description: The professor makes three Tidal Strike attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: {@atk ms,rs} 7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) cold damage.
actions.name: Tidal Strike

actions.description:
The professor casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15):
At will: minor illusion

1/day each: wall of ice

2/day each: control water, create or destroy water, mage armor, stone shape
actions.name: Spellcasting

specialTraits.description: The professor can walk across water and other liquids as if they were solid ground.
specialTraits.name: Water Walking
